mapper.insert: insert into lmtr(lmtr_no, makr_nm, model_nm, instl_lc, instl_de, instl_milg, exchng_de, x_crdnt, y_crdnt) values(#{lmtr_no}, #{makr_nm}, #{model_nm}, #{instl_lc}, #{instl_de}, #{instl_milg}, #{exchng_de}, #{x_crdnt}, #{y_crdnt})
